EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_NextGenDataLake_Session1_Q114.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation: You are registered for our upcoming webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
We are looking forward to you joining us for our next installment in the "What You Can Do With Hadoop" webinar series. Please find event details below:
Date: Thursday, March 27, 2014 Time: 9:00AM PDT (San Francisco)/4:00PM GMT (London) Join the Webex <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/onstage/g.php?d=667292280&t=a> Event Number: 667 292 280 Teleconferencing Information: This webinar will be streaming live, however dial-in options are available:
- Global call-in numbers <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/globalcallin.php?serviceType=EC&ED=112132122&tollFree=1> - Toll-free dialing restrictions <http://www.webex.com/pdf/tollfree_restrictions.pdf> - Access code: 663 114 322
Thank you,
The Pivotal Team
